General.Name: Lens Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Lens Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of electronic components in China. It offers cover glass, metal, sapphire, ceramics, plastics and other materials; and protective panels, touch modules, biometrics, and other appearance structures. It also provides functional components, supporting accessories, fixture molds, and self-developed industrial internet systems, as well as production, testing, and automation equipment. The company serves smartphones, smart wearables, tablet computers, notebook computers, all-in-one computers, new energy vehicles, smart home appliances, photovoltaic products, and other applications. Lens Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Changsha, China.

4.Name: Mr. Zhenzhuo  Zhong
